item.name: New Instance from MCM Model "B_S_M1 Standard Bezug Strom"
Create Instance with Reference to Model "B_S_M1"
DSO - Batched Configuration Activities for Process Status INITIAL/CREATE

exec: 1. DSO -Assign address to Instance / MeLo / Malo
2. DSO - Metering Location (grid level, lossFactor, disconnectable, transformerRequired)

body.raw:
--batch_id-1
Content-Type:application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding:binary

PATCH MCMInstances({{instanceId}}) HTTP/1.1
Accept:application/json;odata.metadata=minimal;IEEE754Compatible=true
Content-Type:application/json;charset=UTF-8;IEEE754Compatible=true

{"leadingAddress_id":"{{addressId-1}}"}

--batch_id-1
Content-Type:application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding:binary

PATCH MCMInstances({{instanceId}})/meteringLocations({{meloId-1}}) HTTP/1.1
Accept:application/json;odata.metadata=minimal;IEEE754Compatible=true
Content-Type:application/json;charset=UTF-8;IEEE754Compatible=true

{"address_id":"{{addressId-1}}"}

--batch_id-1
Content-Type:application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding:binary

PATCH MCMInstances({{instanceId}})/marketLocations({{maloId-1}}) HTTP/1.1
Accept:application/json;odata.metadata=minimal;IEEE754Compatible=true
Content-Type:application/json;charset=UTF-8;IEEE754Compatible=true

{"address_id":"{{addressId-1}}"}

--batch_id-1
Content-Type:application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding:binary

PATCH MCMInstances({{instanceId}})/meteringLocations({{meloId-1}}) HTTP/1.1
Accept:application/json;odata.metadata=minimal;IEEE754Compatible=true
Content-Type:application/json;charset=UTF-8;IEEE754Compatible=true

{
    "gridLevel_code": "MV",
    "disconnectable": false,
    "transformerRequired": false,
    "lossTransformer": "0",
    "lossLine": "0"
}

--batch_id-1
Content-Type:application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding:binary

PATCH MCMInstances({{instanceId}})/changeProcesses({{changeProcessId-1}})/processData/meteringLocationsPD({{meloPDId-1}}) HTTP/1.1
Accept:application/json;odata.metadata=minimal;IEEE754Compatible=true
Content-Type:application/json;charset=UTF-8;IEEE754Compatible=true

{
    "classification": "ANY",
    "note": "Any note on this metering location",
    "volumeCorrector": false,
    "meterOperator": "9903692607804",
    "nominalCapacity": "42",
    "measuringType_code": "MMU"
}

--batch_id-1
